summary:
Adds a NEW, craft-able sword based on Shalamayne, The Shadow Reaver (King Varian Wrynn's Sword) from World of Warcraft.

Available as 1H & 2H and is unenchanted. Also comes in 4k, 2k and 1k Resolutions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/91r8Y9d.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Cf2YKbK.png[/img]

[youtube]uTepLlMxhlE[/youtube] [youtube]9cS-OJwcEpo[/youtube][/center]
[b]About:
[/b]
Shalamayne, The Shadow Reaver, the prestigious sword of King Varian Wrynn from World of Warcraft. This had been requested a number of times over the years and I finally had some free time to create it. I tried to keep it similar to the original model from the game, as opposed to creating the versions from concept and fan art. Shalla'tor and Ellemayne are currently not included as I don't have the time to create 3 whole swords, however they may be introduced at a later date. 

Appearance varies based on ENB Preset & Game Settings. It is recommended to [u]NOT[/u] have ENB Lens enabled. Also, you don't have to like World of Warcraft to use them! 

[center][b][color=#6fa8dc]Dual Sheath Redux Compatible![/color][/b][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] 

[b]Shalamayne, The Shadow Reaver (One-Handed)[/b]
[color=#999999]15 Base Damage - Craftable & Unenchanted[/color]

[b]Shalamayne, The Shadow Reaver (Two-Handed)[/b]
[color=#999999]25 Base Damage - Craftable & Unenchanted

Both swords are currently [b]Unenchanted[/b] so that the user can customize them as they wish. [/color]

[color=#ff0000][b][center]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed![/center]
[/b][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

Each sword is craftable at the forge under "Elven" and refined using the Grindstone.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Shalamayne - Johnskyrim.esp
Shalamayne - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:

[/b]Q. Where is Ellemayne & Shallator?
A. I don't currently have the time to make 3 blades. Might come later. Might.

Q. Why is this smithed under Elven?
A. The sword is of Night Elf descent, though no relation to Tamriel elves.

Q. Can you make this this this and this?
A. I might, but unlikely. Modding takes a long time.

Q. Can you make this do this?
A. No!

Q. What ENB are you using?
A. A modified Aeon ENB

Q. What mods are you working on/got planned?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][b]facebook[/b][/url] page!

Q. Is the Paladin Judgement Armor dead?
A. No, it's just being worked on very slowly due to rigging problems.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- ENB Lens Effect may be bright (best disabled)
- Screen sometimes darkens in First Person mode. If anybody knows a fix, I'd like to know.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod! [b]Remember, modding is stressful and we do it for free![/b]

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center]
[url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/F9p2o48.png[/img]
